# Flare (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Burst of light

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 284

This cantrip creates a burst of light. If you cause the light to burst in front of a single creature, that creature is [[Dazzled|dazzled]] for 1 minute unless it makes a successful Fortitude save. Sightless creatures, as well as creatures already [[Dazzled|dazzled]], are not affected by *flare*.
